backend/main.mo: Defines a contact submission actor storing timestamped messages and exposes submit and retrieval functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a headline update requirement to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend components and sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme variables and dark mode overrides with global border and body styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root element and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation state and rendering Home, Services, or Contact sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying a Â© notice with a heart icon and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus that switch sections via buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and updating a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query mutation hook for submitting contact form data and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind theme variables and dark mode styles with updated color tokens and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, identity provider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Renders a contact form with name and message fields, client-side validation, and success/error handling via a submit mutation.
frontend/src/sections/HomeSection.tsx: Displays the hero section with the user's name, intro text, call-to-action buttons, and basic stats.
frontend/src/sections/ServicesSection.ts: Shows a grid of service cards with icons, descriptions, and feature lists sourced from a static array.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, and container settings for the app's theme.
project_state.json: Stores the project's metadata, implementing features, requirements, and pending feature requests for the portfolio app.
